SEARCH
Package com.example.project_seekdeep.Helpers

Class UserProvider

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_seekdeep.Helpers.UserProvider
public class UserProvider extends Object

This class is in charge of handling the following's list of the logged-in user through firestore. 

 
    
     Classes that will use UserProvider (sharing the same instance of it):
      
  • OtherUsersProfileFragment: to send follow requests, and unfollow users. 
    • 
      
  • ManageRequestsFragment: to accept and decline follow requests from other users: 
    • 
          
      
              
    • when the logged-in user accepts a request: find the doc where follower==requester invalid input: '&'invalid input: '&' followee==loggedInUser invalid input: '&'invalid input: '&' status=="pending", and change "pending"-->"following"
      • 
              
    • when loggedInUser denies a request, find the doc where follower==requester invalid input: '&'invalid input: '&' followee==loggedInUser invalid input: '&'invalid input: '&' status=="pending", and delete the doc
      •
See Also:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    acceptFollowRequest(UserProfile userBeingViewed)
    This method will edit the document where followee==loggedInUser and follower==userBeingViewed to change the pending request to a following one
    void
    declineFollowRequest(UserProfile userBeingViewed)
    This method will edit the document where followee==loggedInUser and follower==userBeingViewed to change the pending request to a following one
    static UserProvider
    getInstance(UserProfile currentUser, com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
     
    void
    listenForDeniedRequests()
     
    void
    sendFollowRequestToDataBase(FollowRequest newFollowRequest)
    This method uploads a new follow request from the logged-in user to another user into firebase.
    void
    unfollowThisUser(UserProfile userBeingViewed)
    This method will delete the document where follower==loggedInUser and followee==userBeingViewed and status=="following" This method also removed the userBeingViewed from the UserProfile object's followings-list

    • unfollowThisUser

      public void unfollowThisUser(UserProfile userBeingViewed)
      This method will delete the document where follower==loggedInUser and followee==userBeingViewed and status=="following" This method also removed the userBeingViewed from the UserProfile object's followings-list
